list_definition.definition: to travel or be carried (in a car, train etc or on a bicycle, horse etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He rides to work every day on an old bicycle

list_definition.definition: to (be able to) ride on and control (a horse, bicycle etc)
to take part (in a horse-race etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He’s riding in the first race.

list_definition.definition: to go out regularly on horseback (eg as a hobby)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: My daughter rides every Saturday morning.

list_definition.definition: a journey on horseback, on a bicycle etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He likes to go for a long ride on a Sunday afternoon.

list_definition.definition: a usually short period of riding on or in something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Can I have a ride on your bike?
